title: Software Intern
description:
**Company Description** 





 Arkaana.ai is on a mission to help companies hire for culture by combining artificial and human intelligence, efficiency, and culture\\-driven insights. We aim to significantly reduce hiring time and improve hiring quality by helping companies find the right talent with the right approach. Our platform is designed to make talent acquisition friendly for the upcoming generation, ensuring a future\\-ready workforce. We focus on more than just an ATS platform or CV screening; we provide deep cultural insights to transform the hiring process.
 




  






 We are looking for a Software Intern to help our CTO to build our technology vision, and build a world\\-class product from the ground up. This is an opportunity to shape the product, culture, and future of the company along side the founding team.
 




  






 We’re currently building a prototype and are also working with a few companies to build out a prototype
 




  






 Role Description
 





 This is a full\\-time remote role for a Full Stack Software Intern located in Pune. They will be responsible for both front\\-end and back\\-end web development tasks, including building scalable software systems, implementing web\\-based applications, to deliver high\\-quality features. The role involves ensuring rapid development, code quality and performance, troubleshooting and debugging applications, and maintaining technical documentation.
 




  






 Qualifications
 



* Proficiency in Back\\-End Web Development and Full\\-Stack Development
* Experience in Front\\-End Development, including Cascading Style Sheets (CSS)
* Knowledge of building AI powered applications
* Background in Software Development via Projects/Internships
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field is a plus
* Experience with modern web development frameworks and tools is a plus

title: Software Engineer
description:
**Company Description** 




 iCert Global is an Education Technology company that offers globally recognized certification training courses designed to accelerate the careers of working professionals across various industries. With a strong presence in 108 countries, iCert Global provides training through instructor\\-led classroom workshops, live virtual training sessions, and self\\-paced e\\-learning programs. Our course offerings span areas such as Project Management, Quality Management, Agile and Scrum, Cyber Security, Data Science, and Emerging Technologies. Whether for individuals or enterprises, iCert Global equips professionals with the skills and certifications needed to stay competitive in a rapidly evolving global workforce. Visit www.icertglobal.com for more information.

Daily tasks include writing, testing, and debugging code, collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to deliver high\\-quality applications, and maintaining technical documentation. The chosen candidate will contribute to the improvement of development practices and participate in code reviews to ensure efficiency and quality.

title: C++ Backend Developer – Drone Software
description:
**Location:** 
 On\\-site
 



**Experience Level:** 
 1–2 years
 



**Employment Type:** 
 Full\\-time
 



  




 Job Description
 
 We are looking for a skilled
 **C\\+\\+ Backend Engineer** 
 to design and build reliable backend services for unmanned aerial systems (UAS). You will be responsible for developing high\\-performance software that interfaces with drones using
 **MAVSDK, MAVLink** 
 , and real\\-time communication protocols, enabling secure command\\-and\\-control, telemetry handling, and mission automation.
 



  




 Key Responsibilities
 * Develop and maintain backend services in
 **C\\+\\+** 
 for drone control, telemetry, and mission management.
* Implement and customize drone integrations using
 **MAVSDK** 
 and the
 **MAVLink protocol** 
 .
* Build robust communication handlers for real\\-time data exchange between UAVs and ground systems.
* Work with flight controllers (PX4 / ArduPilot) for mission execution and monitoring.
* Troubleshoot communication failures, latency issues, and unexpected drone behaviors.
* Optimize backend systems for performance, fault tolerance, and scalability.
* Integrate backend services with UI, cloud systems, and hardware\\-level interfaces.
* Write clean, testable, and maintainable production\\-grade code and documentation.



  




 Required Skills \\& Qualifications
 * Strong proficiency in
 **C\\+\\+ (C\\+\\+11/14/17\\)** 
 .
* Hands\\-on experience with
 **MAVSDK** 
 and
 **MAVLink** 
 integration.
* Experience working with UAVs / robotics / real\\-time systems.
* Understanding of networking protocols (TCP/UDP/WebSockets/RTPS).
* Familiarity with
 **Linux\\-based systems** 
 and embedded environments.
* Experience debugging communication protocols and hardware\\-software integrations.
* Knowledge of multithreading and real\\-time constraints.
* Ability to work independently in a fast\\-paced R\\&D environment.



  




 Preferred / Good to Have
 * Experience with
 **PX4 / ArduPilot** 
 firmware.
* Familiarity with ROS / ROS2\\.
* Experience with simulation tools like Gazebo / SITL / HITL.
* Understanding of drone safety systems, failsafe mechanisms, and geofencing.
* Exposure to system architecture for swarm drones or multiple\\-UAV control.
* Knowledge of cloud, telemetry pipelines, or edge compute environments.



  




 What We Offer
 * Opportunity to work on cutting\\-edge drone technology.
* Real\\-world deployment exposure and ownership of system architecture.
* Fast\\-moving startup culture with learning and growth opportunities.
* Competitive salary based on experience and skills.

title: Embedded Software Engineer
description:
**Job Title: Embedded Software Design Engineer (Motor Controller)** 




**Location:** 
 Pune, Maharashtra, India (On\\-site)
 



  





**About the Role** 




  





 We are seeking an experienced
 **Embedded Software Design Engineer** 
 specializing in
 **Motor Controller development** 
 for Electric Vehicle (EV) applications. The role involves end\\-to\\-end software design, development, and optimization for BLDC, PMSM, SRM, and Axial Flux motors used in e\\-powertrain systems.
 



 You’ll collaborate with hardware, controls, and vehicle integration teams to deliver reliable, high\\-performance motor control solutions that meet industry safety and quality standards.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




  




* Design, develop, and test software for electric motor controllers in EV applications.
* Develop and implement motor control algorithms using
 **MATLAB/Simulink** 
 , DSPs, and microcontrollers.
* Select suitable embedded components (MCUs, sensors, etc.) and design system interfaces.
* Integrate motor controller software with
 **battery management systems** 
 ,
 **vehicle control units** 
 , and propulsion components.
* Perform testing and validation of control software to meet
 **safety, performance, and reliability** 
 standards.
* Optimize code and algorithms for improved system efficiency.
* Maintain detailed technical documentation—design specs, test plans, and user manuals.
* Ensure compliance with automotive and functional safety standards (
 **ISO 26262** 
 , DFMEA, etc.).
* Stay updated on global EV and motor control technologies to support innovation and roadmap planning.



  





**Required Qualifications** 




  




* **Bachelor’s or Master’s** 
 degree in
 **Electronics / Electrical / E\\&TC Engineering** 
 or related field.
* **3–8 years** 
 of experience in motor controller design and embedded systems.
* Proficient in
 **MATLAB/Simulink** 
 , control systems design, and motor control algorithms (FOC, PWM, MTPA, Field Weakening).
* Hands\\-on experience with
 **DSPs** 
 ,
 **microcontrollers** 
 , and
 **C/C\\+\\+** 
 programming.
* Strong understanding of
 **PMSM, BLDC, and Axial Flux motor control** 
 .
* Knowledge of
 **US and international standards** 
 , DFMEA, and functional safety concepts.
* Excellent problem\\-solving, debugging, and teamwork skills.



  





**Nice\\-to\\-Have Skills** 




  




* Experience in hybrid or electric powertrain systems.
* Knowledge of thermal management and system tuning.
* Early availability (Immediate to 90 days notice).
* Exposure to
 **SAP/ISO26262** 
 , automotive\\-grade validation methods.



  





**Additional Details** 




  




* **Job Type:** 
 Full\\-time, On\\-site (Baner, Pune)
* **Role Type:** 
 Individual Contributor (IC)
* **Interview Process:** 
 2 rounds \\+ Technical Assignment (if required)
* **Relocation Expenses:** 
 Supported for eligible candidates
* **Compensation:** 
 Flexible and negotiable based on experience \\& interview performance

title: Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
**Job Summary:** 




  





 We are urgently looking for a QA Engineer with expertise in both manual and automation testing to support the Credential Streams project. The role will focus on functional testing of MuleSoft API integrations with multiple enterprise systems, including iCIMS, Workday, and Epic. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of API integrations, web applications, and complex API workflows.
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 




  




* Perform manual API testing for MuleSoft integrations with iCIMS, Workday, and Epic.
* Develop and execute test cases, test plans, and test scripts to ensure system reliability and performance.
* Analyze API workflows, validate responses, and troubleshoot integration issues.
* Collaborate with developers, business analysts, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless system integration.
* Transition from manual API testing to API automation using MuleSoft RPA (already licensed for automation efforts).
* Utilize automation frameworks such as Cucumber, and programming languages like Python or Java for test script development.
* Maintain detailed documentation of test cases, defects, and test results.



  





**Qualifications:** 



* 8 \\+ Experience in manual and automation testing.
* Strong understanding of API testing and experience with tools like Postman, SOAP UI, or REST Assured.
* Experience in API automation using open\\-source frameworks (Cucumber, Selenium, etc.).
* Proficiency in Python or Java for test automation scripting.
* Knowledge of MuleSoft API integrations and enterprise systems such as iCIMS, Workday, and Epic.
* Familiarity with MuleSoft RPA is a plus.
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail.



  





**Preferred Qualifications:** 



* Experience with automation skills (Python, Java, open\\-source frameworks like Cucumber).
* Work duration: 6 months contract. May extend

title: Staff Software Engineer
description:
At Cision, we believe in empowering every individual to make an impact. Here, your voice is heard, your ideas are valued, and your unique perspective fuels our collective success. As part of our global team, you'll thrive in an environment that champions curiosity, collaboration, and innovation, all while making meaningful contributions to the brands we accelerate.
   

  

 Join us in shaping the future of communication and building authentic connections that matter. Whether you're solving complex problems or driving bold innovations, your growth is our success, and together, we’ll create the conversations of tomorrow.
   

  

**Empower your impact at Cision. Be seen, be understood, be you.**
**Job Summary:** 
 You will collaborate closely with product, design, technology, and data science teams, you will be part of the backend platform team to build new backend services, processes, and components and improve existing ones. You will take a lead role in reviewing code changes within your team and provide thoughtful feedback to drive quality and best practices. You will actively evaluate technologies for applications and make recommendations aligned with team and product needs. You’ll mentor engineers at various levels, sharing your knowledge of code maintainability, performance, reliability, observability, security, and functionality. With a strong understanding of the tech stack and SSDLC, you’ll contribute significantly to project success and team productivity. You may serve as a subject matter expert (SME) within the engineering organization, providing insights to cross\\-functional teams.
   

  

  

  

**Essential Duties And Responsibilities**
* Develop and own solutions that add value across systems while balancing technical debt.
* Collaborate closely with engineers, product owners, and other stakeholders to align on optimal solutions that meet product goals.
* Lead in fostering a Test First mentality and emphasize quality at the code level.
* Help translate complex product requirements into clear, actionable technical tasks.
* Stay informed about technology trends and product roadmaps, providing strategic guidance to the development team.
* Actively support cross\\-functional business processes, facilitating collaboration and communication.
* Work with other senior\\-level stakeholders to ensure adherence to best practices, cross\\-team synergy, and consistency in processes.
* Mentor and support mid\\-level and junior engineers as they progress in their technical skills and knowledge.
* Contribute to a culture of collaboration, building strong relationships based on mutual respect and shared goals.


  

  

**Required Skills**
* C\\#
* .NET 8\\+
* SQL
* Git
* Unit Testing
* RESTful web services
* Messaging \\& queuing
* Docker
* Microservice Data Architecture


  

  

**Preferred Skills**
* MySQL
* Postgres
* Kubernetes
* GraphQL
* Data processing/ETL
* Dapr
* Google Cloud Platform (GCP)


  

  

**Required Education And Experience**
 Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science related subject area or related business field and eight (8\\) or more year’s experience in Information Technology and solution delivery, or equivalent combination of education and experience in similar fields is required.
   

  

 As a global leader in PR, marketing and social media management technology and intelligence, Cision helps brands and organizations to identify, connect and engage with customers and stakeholders to drive business results. PR Newswire, a network of over 1\\.1 billion influencers, in\\-depth monitoring, analytics and its Brandwatch and Falcon.io social media platforms headline a premier suite of solutions. Cision has offices in 24 countries throughout the Americas, EMEA and APAC. For more information about Cision's award\\-winning solutions, including its next\\-gen Cision Communications Cloud®, visit www.cision.com and follow @Cision on Twitter.
   

  

 Cision is committed to fostering an inclusive environment where all employees can be their authentic selves and perform at their best. We believe diversity, equity, and inclusion is vital to driving our culture, sparking innovation and achieving long\\-term success. Cision is proud to have joined more than 600 companies in signing the CEO Action for Diversity \\& Inclusion™ pledge and named a “Top Diversity Employer” for 2021 by DiversityJobs.com.
   

  

 Cision is proud to be an equal opportunity employer, seeking to create a welcoming and diverse environment. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, veteran status, or other protected statuses.
   

  

 Cision is committed to the full inclusion of all qualified individuals. In keeping with our commitment, Cision will take the steps to assure that people with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodations. Accordingly, if reasonable accommodation is required to fully participate in the job application or interview process, to perform the essential functions of the position, and/or to receive all other benefits and privileges of employment, please contact hr.support@cision.com
   

  

 Please review our Global Candidate Data Privacy Statement to learn about Cision’s commitment to protecting personal data collected during the hiring process.

title: QA Test Lead | FINJO I973
description:

 7\\- 9 Years

**About the Role**

In this role, you will oversee the end\\-to\\-end QA lifecycle—defining the test strategy, establishing the test approach, managing a team of functional testers, enabling automation, and ensuring each release meets the highest standards for functionality, security, performance, and user experience. You will also promote AI\\-driven efficiency across QA planning, reporting, and execution.

* Work with CS/Sales teams to conduct demos and walkthrough sessions for UAT handover.
* Manage test planning, estimation, execution tracking, and defect tracking.
* Drive NFR testing, including Security, Performance, and User Experience validations.
* Author, review, and approve test plans, test cases, and regression suites for completeness.
* Ensure continuous test process improvement using AI\\-assisted tools.
* Assist in integrating QA workflows with CI/CD pipelines and automation frameworks.

* Maintain instances for demos and simulations.



  





**Required Skills \\& Competencies**

description:

 08

title: E-commerce Test Automation Engineer Telangana / Ap Location Candidates
description:
* Job Title: E\\-commerce Test Automation Engineer
* Location: Hyderabad (E\\-commerce product / E\\-commerce\\-based company only).​


 Role Summary
 
 The E\\-commerce Test Automation Engineer is responsible for end\\-to\\-end functional and automation testing of web and mobile e\\-commerce platforms. The role focuses on automating critical user journeys (search, cart, checkout, payments, orders, returns) and maintaining stable regression suites for every release.​
 


 Key Responsibilities
 * Design and execute functional and automated test scenarios for core e\\-commerce flows: product discovery, cart, checkout, payment, order tracking, returns, and refunds.​
* Develop, maintain, and optimize automated regression suites using Selenium WebDriver (or similar tools such as Cypress/Playwright) for web and mobile web.​
* Automate smoke, sanity, and regression test cases and integrate them into CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins/GitLab or similar).​
* Validate integrations with payment gateways, logistics partners, ERP/OMS, CRM and related APIs through both manual and automated tests.​
* Log and track defects with detailed steps, logs, and screenshots, and collaborate with developers and product managers to ensure timely resolution.​
* Participate in sprint ceremonies and provide QA \\+ automation impact assessment and sign\\-off for releases.​


 Mandatory Experience \\& Skills
 * 3–6 years of QA / Testing experience with minimum 2\\+ years in e\\-commerce applications and 2\\+ years in automation testing using Selenium (Java/C\\#/Python).​
* Strong hands\\-on experience in building and maintaining Selenium\\-based automation frameworks (POM, data\\-driven, BDD, or hybrid) and writing reusable test scripts.​
* Proven experience automating end\\-to\\-end e\\-commerce flows on live projects (catalog, cart, checkout, multiple payment methods, order, returns/refunds).​
* Good understanding of API testing (Postman/RestAssured) and ability to automate critical API scenarios for orders, payments, and inventory is preferred.​
* Experience with test management and defect tracking tools such as JIRA, TestRail, or similar.​


 Preferred
 * Prior experience in Hyderabad\\-based e\\-commerce product companies or large online retail platforms.​

title: Module lead: .net+angular+mfe
description:
**This role is for one of the Weekday's clients**
**Salary range: Rs 1500000 \\- Rs 3500000 (ie INR 15\\-35 LPA)**
 Min Experience: 8 years
   

  

 JobType: full\\-time
   

  

 As a Module Lead, you will take ownership of end\\-to\\-end module development, ensuring seamless integration between frontend and backend systems. You will be responsible for architectural decisions, code reviews, and solution optimization to deliver a robust user experience in line with modern engineering standards. In this role, you will drive the development of sophisticated web applications using
 **Angular with reactive state management (NgRx/RxJS)** 
 and backend services built on
 **.NET and ASP.NET Core** 
 . You will also play a key role in implementing and managing
 **Micro Frontend (MFE)** 
 structures to enhance application scalability and modularity. Your leadership will help shape development strategies, support continuous improvement, and deliver high\\-quality solutions that align with business goals.
   

  

**Requirements**
****Key Responsibilities****
* Technical Leadership: Lead module\\-level architecture design and development using .NET, ASP.NET, Angular, and MFE principles
* Frontend Development: Build responsive, high\\-performance UI components using Angular, TypeScript, NgRx for state management, and RxJS for reactive programming
* Backend Services: Develop, optimize, and maintain RESTful APIs and backend services using .NET/ASP.NET Core
* Micro Frontend Architecture: Design and implement MFE\\-based structures to enable scalable, modular, and maintainable applications
* Code Quality \\& Review: Conduct detailed code reviews to ensure adherence to coding standards, best practices, performance optimization, and security guidelines
* Collaboration: Work closely with product managers, architects, designers, and QA teams to deliver high\\-quality modules within defined timelines
* Performance Optimization: Identify performance bottlenecks across frontend and backend, and implement efficient solutions
* Mentoring: Guide and mentor team members, provide technical coaching, and support their professional growth
* Documentation: Maintain clear and comprehensive technical documentation for modules, architecture, and APIs
* Continuous Improvement: Evaluate emerging technologies, frameworks, and tools to improve application performance and development efficiency
* Problem\\-Solving: Troubleshoot complex technical issues and propose scalable and effective solutions


**What Makes You a Great Fit**
* Extensive Experience: Minimum 8 years of professional experience in full\\-stack development using .NET technologies and Angular
* Expert in Modern Frontend: Strong hands\\-on experience with Angular, NgRx, and RxJS, with the ability to design complex reactive architectures
* Skilled in Micro Frontends: Practical experience in implementing and managing MFE structures for enterprise applications
* Strong Backend Knowledge: Proficiency in .NET/ASP.NET Core for building high\\-performance APIs
* Architectural Thinking: Ability to translate requirements into modular, scalable, and maintainable architecture
* Leadership Qualities: Experience leading teams, mentoring developers, and taking ownership of module delivery
* Problem\\-Solving Mindset: Strong analytical skills with the ability to troubleshoot system\\-level challenges effectively
* Quality\\-Driven: A focus on writing clean, maintainable code and delivering high\\-quality software
* Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication to collaborate effectively with technical and non\\-technical stakeholders
* Adaptability: Comfortable working in fast\\-paced, evolving environments with modern engineering practices

title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer - ML
description:
**Role Summary** 




 We’re looking for a hands\\-on Senior ML Engineer (6–10 years) who can:
 



 • Lead design and delivery of LLM \\& Document AI solutions end\\-to\\-end
 



 • Own ML services in production (APIs, pipelines, monitoring)
 



 • Mentor a team of ML engineers and work directly with clients (US \\& India)
 



 This is a technical leadership role, not a pure manager role.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 




 • Own the end\\-to\\-end lifecycle of AI features – from requirement understanding
 



 and solution design to development, deployment and monitoring.
 



 • Build LLM/RAG\\-based solutions using vector databases (e.g., pgvector, FAISS,
 



 Chroma, OpenSearch) for search, Q\\&A, extraction and summarization over
 



 documents.
 



 • Develop Document AI models / pipelines for OCR post\\-processing, entity/key–
 



 value extraction, classification and layout/table understanding.
 



 • Deploy models as scalable APIs / microservices in cloud and on\\-prem
 



 environments using Python, Docker and CI/CD.
 



 • Work directly with client stakeholders to refine requirements, present solutions
 



 and handle reviews / clarifications.
 



 • Act as technical lead on 2–3 AI projects, guide the team on architecture, design
 



 and best practices.
 



 • Mentor junior ML engineers via code reviews, design discussions and technical
 



 coaching.
 



 • Design with security, privacy and cost in mind, especially for data\\-sensitive
 



 domains (BFSI, healthcare, legal, HR).
 



**Must\\-Have Requirements Experience** 




 • 6–10 years total experience, including 4\\+ years in ML / DL / NLP in production environments.
 



 • Proven experience taking ML solutions from PoC to production (not just notebooks).
 



 Technical Skills
 



 • Strong in Python and core CS fundamentals (data structures, algorithms, clean code).
 



 • Hands\\-on with ML / NLP / LLMs – classification, NER, QA, summarization, document understanding.
 



 • Experience with some of: PyTorch / TensorFlow / Hugging Face / LangChain / LlamaIndex / spaCy.
 



 • Built and deployed RESTful ML services / APIs integrated with web or mobile applications.
 



 • Worked with Docker and CI/CD pipelines; experience on AWS or GCP.
 



 • Good SQL skills and experience with at least one RDBMS (PostgreSQL/MySQL).
 



 • Understanding of MLOps in production – monitoring, logging, model versioning, rollback, performance \\& cost optimisation.
 



**Soft Skills** 




 • Excellent spoken and written English; able to explain complex ideas to nontechnical stakeholders.
 



 • Comfortable interacting with international clients and leading requirement /review calls.
 



 • Strong ownership mindset and ability to lead and mentor junior engineers.
 



 • Willingness to work with partial US time\\-zone overlap for key meetings when required.
 



**Good\\-to\\-Have** 




 • Experience in Logistics, Legal, HR/Recruitment, Healthcare, BFSI, Education,Engineering/Plant drawings.
 



 • Exposure to Vision Transformers / advanced CV for document layout and OCR enhancement.
 



 • Experience with experiment tracking tools (MLflow, DVC, W\\&B, etc.).
 



 • Exposure to security \\& compliance (CIS, SOC2, GDPR, HIPAA, PCI\\-DSS, ITIL).
 



 • Experience with on\\-prem / VPC\\-isolated deployments and data\\-sensitive environments.
 



 • Knowledge of a systems language (Go / Rust / C\\+\\+ / Scala) is a plus, not
 



 mandatory.
 



**Education** 




 • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science / Engineering / related
 



 field (mandatory).
 



 • Master’s degree is a plus

title: EPM ARCS Developer/Sr Developer/Lead/Architects
description:
**Oracle GSC is hiring for EPM Consultants ARCS Developer/Sr Developer, Leads and Architects** 




  





**Job Locations \\- Bengaluru, Mumbai, Chennai, Hyderabad, Noida, Pune, Kolkata, Gandhinagar, Gurgaon** 




  





**Overview** 




 Oracle Global Service Center (GSC) is a unit within oracle that establishes long\\-term relationships with many of Oracle's customers through annuity\\-based service contracts and project\\-based one\\-time services. It is an offshore Hub that will cater to the needs of all Service entities across Oracle globally. GSC team sells from a broad IT\\-services portfolio in both the fixed price and T\\&M basis. GSC services are typically requested by large Oracle customers that require the utmost attention to real mission\\-critical applications and processes. GSC covers the majority of large\\-scale Oracle customers.
 



  





 Oracle Global Service Center provides unmatched, tailored support that ensures organization’s Oracle technology investments deliver the cutting\\-edge innovation and performance your business requires to compete, all while coexisting within your IT environment.
 



  





 We ensure that our customers get the maximum value from their investment in Oracle Products and Services. This consolidation exercise and the associated scale brings in many benefits to Oracle as well:
 



  





 As a Center for Innovation, make quicker progress on Tooling \\& Automation.
 



 As a Center of Expertise, efficiently build scalable solutions.
 



 Effective offshore hiring through centralized intake and growth plans.
 



 Reduced attrition through better growth opportunities for our team
 



  





 This change will mean increased work diversity, improved growth opportunities and an enriched learning environment.
 



  





  





**Description** 




 What You’ll Do
 



  





 Whether you’re onsite or sharing your expertise via the cloud, you’ll deliver top\\-class support and inspire customer loyalty. As an EPM ARCS Developer/Senior Developer/ Lead/ Architect, you will:
 


* Experience implementing ARCS from design, configuration, data integration, and testing
* Sound knowledge on ARM/ARCS including Reconciliation Compliance \\& Transaction Matching
* Functional knowledge of Finance/accounting and account reconciliation is a must
* Knowledge and experience working with a consolidation tool and general ledger is a plus
* Provide Solutions to existing Architecture Design on current system
* Collaborate effectively with other groups



 This position is responsible for overall development of Account Reconciliation solution (ARCS) i.e. design, configuration, data integration and testing. This position will collaborate with various technical experts within our organization to implement technologies within our Enterprise Performance Management (EPM) system. This position will provide best\\-fit architectural solutions for new initiatives; assist in defining scope and sizing of work; and anchor Proof of Concept developments. This position will provide solution architecture for the business problem, platform integration with third party services, designing and developing complex features for clients' business needs.
 



  





  





**Required Skills/Experience** 




**What You’ll Bring** 




  





  





 You have that rare combination—a sharp technical brain and a head for business. You’ll use this to help customers achieve real\\-world success with our products. We also look for:
 


* EPM Experience 3 \\- 20 years' experience
* Experience in Implementation of Hyperion with strong Application Development process experience on ARCS/ARM and good knowledge on consolidation process
* Experience in Requirement Gathering \\& Solution Design
* Sound functional knowledge Finance/accounting/ General Ledger/Sub Ledgers
* Sound Knowledge on standard and custom reports
* Good communication Skills
* Travel Readiness

title: Principal Engineer - Collaboration
description:
**Site Name:** 
 Bengaluru Luxor North Tower
   

  

**Posted Date:** 
 Nov 5 2025
   

  

**Role Overview:**
 This role aligns with Tech’s strategic goal of retaining design capabilities to strengthen capacity for End\\-User Services (EUS) objectives and to support mergers, acquisitions, and divestitures.
   

  

 As a Principal Engineer\\-Collaboration, you will be responsible for owning, designing, and enforcing policies and security configurations that define standards and harden workspace endpoints.
   

  

 You will work with the latest workspace technologies and applications, providing senior\\-level engineering expertise to design, build, and deploy solutions that modernize and secure the enterprise environment. You will play a pivotal role in shaping and managing collaboration technologies that empower seamless communication and productivity across the organization.
   

  

 This position requires subject matter expertise, strategic thinking, and hands\\-on leadership in delivering advanced collaboration solutions that improve the end\\-user experience while ensuring compliance and scalability.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Lead the design, build, and delivery of Collaboration technologies and applications.
* Define, implement, and maintain policies and security configurations in alignment with enterprise standards.
* Act as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) for Collaboration technologies, guiding strategic decisions and technical implementations.
* Drive continuous improvement of collaboration platforms, focusing on end\\-user experience and adoption.
* Define and execute integration architectures, proof of concepts, and deployment models.
* Ensure production readiness and technical quality of all Collaboration platforms.
* Supervise and guide strategic partners and contract workers, ensuring delivery quality and alignment with enterprise goals.
* Provide architectural leadership in collaboration solutions across multiple platforms and vendors.


**Required Qualifications \\& Skills:**
* Bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science or related discipline.
* 10–15 years of overall industry experience.
* Minimum 6\\+ years of experience in infrastructure operations in the field of Unified Comms \\& Collaboration
* 4\\+ years in leading delivery of technical teams, support functions, and supplier management.
* Hands on experience in Scripting technologies PowerShell/Python is required
* Exp of working on Agile methodology is required
* Exp in any Agentic AI tools are desirable
* Strong leadership skills with the ability to influence and guide stakeholders.
* Proven expertise in designing scalable, secure, and user\\-centric collaboration solutions.
* Ability to operate at both strategic and hands\\-on engineering levels.
* Passion for driving innovation and continuous improvement in collaboration technology.


**Technical Expertise ((At least 2 of the below mentioned vendor products):**
* Microsoft: Teams, Yammer, Azure
* Cisco: Webex, Jabber, SPARC
* Polycom, Blue Jeans, Zoom, Workvivo
* Facebook: Workplace, Work Chat
* Slack, Call Plan, Surveying \\& Polling solutions
* Modern Meeting Place \\& User Experience (VTC)
* Social \\& Collaboration platforms integration and product lifecycle management
* Google Workspace


**Inclusion at GSK:**
 As an employer committed to Inclusion, we encourage you to reach out if you need any adjustments during the recruitment process.
   

  

 Please contact our Recruitment Team at IN.recruitment\\-adjustments@gsk.com to discuss your needs.
   

  

**Why GSK?**
**Uniting science, technology and talent to get ahead of disease together.**
 GSK is a global biopharma company with a purpose to unite science, technology and talent to get ahead of disease together. We aim to positively impact the health of 2\\.5 billion people by the end of the decade, as a successful, growing company where people can thrive. We get ahead of disease by preventing and treating it with innovation in specialty medicines and vaccines. We focus on four therapeutic areas: respiratory, immunology and inflammation; oncology; HIV; and infectious diseases – to impact health at scale.
   

  

 People and patients around the world count on the medicines and vaccines we make, so we’re committed to creating an environment where our people can thrive and focus on what matters most. Our culture of being ambitious for patients, accountable for impact and doing the right thing is the foundation for how, together, we deliver for patients, shareholders and our people.
   

  

**Inclusion at GSK:**
 As an employer committed to Inclusion, we encourage you to reach out if you need any adjustments during the recruitment process.
   

  

 Please contact our Recruitment Team at IN.recruitment\\-adjustments@gsk.com to discuss your needs.
   

  

**Important notice to Employment businesses/ Agencies**
 GSK does not accept referrals from employment businesses and/or employment agencies in respect of the vacancies posted on this site. All employment businesses/agencies are required to contact GSK's commercial and general procurement/human resources department to obtain prior written authorization before referring any candidates to GSK. The obtaining of prior written authorization is a condition precedent to any agreement (verbal or written) between the employment business/ agency and GSK. In the absence of such written authorization being obtained any actions undertaken by the employment business/agency shall be deemed to have been performed without the consent or contractual agreement of GSK. GSK shall therefore not be liable for any fees arising from such actions or any fees arising from any referrals by employment businesses/agencies in respect of the vacancies posted on this site.
   

  

 It has come to our attention that the names of GlaxoSmithKline or GSK or our group companies are being used in connection with bogus job advertisements or through unsolicited emails asking candidates to make some payments for recruitment opportunities and interview. Please be advised that such advertisements and emails are not connected with the GlaxoSmithKline group in any way.
   

  

**GlaxoSmithKline does not charge any fee whatsoever for recruitment process. Please do not make payments to any individuals / entities in connection with recruitment with any GlaxoSmithKline (or GSK) group company at any worldwide location. Even if they claim that the money is refundable.**
 If you come across unsolicited email from email addresses not ending in gsk.com or job advertisements which state that you should contact an email address that does not end in “gsk.com”, you should disregard the same and inform us by emailing askus@gsk.com, so that we can confirm to you if the job is genuine.

title: ERPNext Developer JD
description:
**About the Role** 




 We are looking for an experienced ERPNext Developer who will take complete ownership of ERPNext development, including discovery, planning, customization, testing, and deployment. The ideal candidate will have a strong grasp of ERPNext architecture, business process mapping, and end\\-to\\-end implementation capabilities.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Lead the full life cycle of ERPNext implementation—from requirements gathering and design to deployment and support.
* Customize ERPNext modules, workflows, forms, permissions, and reports to meet business requirements.
* Develop and integrate new apps or features within ERPNext using Frappe framework.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to understand business processes and translate them into scalable ERP solutions.
* Perform system performance tuning, bug fixing, and continuous improvement activities.
* Conduct testing, documentation, and user training to ensure reliability and adoption.
* Manage ERPNext updates, migrations, and maintenance while ensuring data integrity.



  





**Required Skills and Qualifications:** 



* Proven experience as an ERPNext Developer with deep knowledge of Frappe Framework and Python.
* Hands\\-on experience in customizing modules like Accounting, HR, Manufacturing, CRM, Inventory, and Sales.
* Strong understanding of database design (MariaDB/MySQL) and web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript).
* Expertise in REST API development and third\\-party integrations.
* Ability to manage projects independently and deliver end\\-to\\-end solutions.
* Excellent analytical, problem\\-solving, and communication skills.
* Minimum 1\\+ years of ERPNext implementation and customization experience preferred.



  





**Nice to Have** 



* Experience in Dockerized or cloud\\-based ERPNext environments.
* Exposure to Git, CI/CD pipelines, and automation tools.
* Knowledge of Linux server management.

title: Senior Staff Engineer - IT
description:
R1 RCM India is proud to be recognized amongst India's Top 50 Best Companies to Work For™ 2023 by Great Place To Work® Institute. We are committed to transform the healthcare industry with our innovative revenue cycle management services. Our goal is to ‘make healthcare simpler’ and enable efficiency for healthcare systems, hospitals, and physician practices. With over 30,000 employees globally, we are about 14,000 strong in India with offices in Delhi NCR, Hyderabad, Bangalore, and Chennai. Our inclusive culture ensures that every employee feels valued, respected, and appreciated with a robust set of employee benefits and engagement activities.
   

  

**Position Overview**
 R1’s IT Security Team is seeking an accomplished IT Risk and Management (ITRM) Lead Staff Engineer. This position will primarily concentrate on automating User Access Reviews and ensuring Audit Compliance, along with other ITRM responsibilities as assigned. The selected candidate will oversee user access review automation, maintain regulatory compliance, and actively support audit functions. This role requires deep expertise in access control, compliance mandates, and hands\\-on experience with implementing and managing automated solutions.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* User Access Review Automation: \\*
* Design, implement, and manage automated user access review solutions.
* Develop, enhance, and maintain scripts, tools, and processes to optimize access review workflows.
* Collaborate closely with IT and security teams to integrate access review systems into the existing technology landscape.
* Continuously monitor and verify the accuracy and effectiveness of automated access review processes.
* Perform quality assurance (QA) reviews to ensure process integrity.
* Audit Compliance: \\*
* Maintain compliance with all relevant regulatory frameworks, such as SOX, SOC 2, PCI, HIPAA, and other applicable standards.
* Prepare and manage documentation to support both internal and external audits and compliance reviews.
* Conduct periodic internal audits to confirm adherence to established access control policies and procedures.
* Provide required documentation and address issues during external audits.
* Conduct or support Vendor Audits to ensure that R1’s vendors comply with contractual and regulatory obligations.


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s degree in information technology, Cybersecurity, Business Administration, or related field.
* Demonstrated experience in user access review automation, audit compliance, or similar disciplines.
* Strong command of access control methodologies, regulatory frameworks, and compliance standards.
* Proficiency in scripting and automation technologies (e.g., Python, PowerShell, Java).
* Practical experience with identity and access management (IAM) systems and associated tools.
* Superior analytical, problem\\-solving, and organizational abilities.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with a proven ability to collaborate effectively with cross\\-functional teams.
* Relevant certifications such as CISA, CISM, CISSP, or equivalent credentials are highly desirable.


 Working in an evolving healthcare setting, we use our shared expertise to deliver innovative solutions. Our fast\\-growing team has opportunities to learn and grow through rewarding interactions, collaboration and the freedom to explore professional interests.
   

  

 Our associates are given valuable opportunities to contribute, to innovate and create meaningful work that makes an impact in the communities we serve around the world. We also offer a culture of excellence that drives customer success and improves patient care. We believe in giving back to the community and offer a competitive benefits package. To learn more, visit: r1rcm.com
   

  

 Visit us on Facebook

title: Mainframe DB2 System Programmer
description:
6\\+ years of experience as mainframe DB2 System Programmer
   

  

 Skills involves and not limited to, o Evaluate and implement new features/functions of DB2 and associated third party products. o Extensive use of utilities and Performance Monitoring tools using BMC, CA and IBM products. o Consultant on DB2 database applications architecture o Knowledge of SMP/E and can prepare for and apply maintenance to a DB2 subsystem o Engineer and execute the processes to upgrade and/or apply maintenance to releases / versions of mainframe database system software, and associated third party products o Maintain DSNZPARMs o Implement automated disaster recovery mechanisms for Mainframe Database subsystems and associated third party products. Participate in all recovery coordination activities o Create \\& modify WLM address spaces for stored procedures as needed o Database security management o Backup/Recovery strategies o Strategy Reviews o Scalability Analysis o Database Architecture design strategy o Planning Database maintenance window o Capacity planning o Monitor and troubleshoot DB2 address spaces for any potential issues o DB2 Database configuration across difference Mainframe LPARs

title: Software Engineer Intern
description:
**Company Description**

 Grantify is a cutting\\-edge education platform revolutionizing the admissions process by connecting students with universities through a transparent, data\\-driven ecosystem. By aligning students' academic goals and budgets with tailored university offers, Grantify simplifies decision\\-making and enhances accessibility to higher education. The platform also empowers universities to efficiently engage with qualified candidates. Grantify is dedicated to making higher education more accessible, affordable, and student\\-focused to build a better future for learners worldwide.
   




**Role Description**

 We are seeking a Software Engineer Intern for a remote internship opportunity. In this role, you will collaborate with the engineering team to develop and enhance software solutions, implement back\\-end systems, and contribute to product development. The intern will engage in programming tasks, maintain adherence to best practices, and apply object\\-oriented methodologies to create scalable, reliable, and efficient applications. You will have the opportunity to learn, innovate, and contribute to meaningful projects that align with our mission.
   




**Qualifications**
* Strong foundation in Computer Science concepts and principles
* Experience with Back\\-End Web Development and Software Development
* Proficiency in Programming languages and methodologies
* Knowledge of Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP) and related paradigms
* Ability to work collaboratively and communicate effectively in a team setting
* Passion for learning and a proactive attitude toward tackling complex challenges
* Currently pursuing or holding a degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field
* Familiarity with version control systems and agile development processes is a plus
